Speaker: Mr FISHER
Title: AUSTRALIAN INDUSTRIES
text: I ask the Prime Minister whether he has any communication to make to the House, or whether his intends to pursue a course which will enable us to look upon his smiling face a little longer!

Speaker: Mr JOSEPH COOK
Title: AUSTRALIAN INDUSTRIES
text: A day or ttfo ago I tendered certain advice to His Excellency the Governor General, which he has been pleased to accept, and I have i to announce to the House that His Ex, cellency haa decided to dissolve simultaneously both Houses of the Parliament so soon as the ordinary provision has been made for the conduct of the Public Service during the time of the elections. Following the usual. practice, I therefore move That the House do now adjourn. Question resolved in the affirmative. House adjourned at 10.35 a.in.
